long_description:
# Moon phases
Changes the moon to follow a cycle between eight different phases.
The mod uses either custom made textures or free NASA photography to rotate between multiple textures.
It provides an API for other mods to change or retrieve the current phase as well as chat commands.
The cycle length of 32 days can be adjusted with the configuration.

Compatible with Climate API.
Version 2.0.0 will also brighten up your sky during a full moon.

**Important**: Requires at least Minetest 5.2.0
